   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Investigation of SDR concepts for SAW sensing
=============================================

Coding documentation
---------------------
The documentation attempts to give the overview of the programming used in the thesis.
The theis aims at SDR based readers for contactless SAW sensing. Making use of Pluto SDR the thesis shows the implementation of the reader designs that have been discussed in various adcademic papers.

---------

   src_doc/miscellaneous
